summary: This document is a Certificate of Incorporation for Hyperion Air, Inc., filed in Delaware. It outlines the corporation's purpose, structure, and governance, including details about stock issuance and the management of the corporation.

persons.name: Athena Togias
persons.context: Athena Togias is named as the incorporator of Hyperion Air, Inc., providing her mailing address in New York.

locations: 32 Leucite Square, Suite L-100, City of Dover, County of Kent, Delaware
keyFacts: The document certifies the incorporation of Hyperion Air, Inc. in Delaware.
Athena Togias is listed as the incorporator of the corporation.
The corporation is authorized to issue 1,500 shares of common stock.
The registered office of the corporation is located in Dover, Delaware.
The corporation is intended to have perpetual existence.
